wikipedia_page.main: Lilian Ridgewell (19 October 1912 – July 1997) was a British gymnast. She competed in the women's artistic team all-around event at the 1936 Summer Olympics.

link_mentions.page: List of Olympic female artistic gymnasts for Great Britain
Great Britain women's national gymnastics team
response: *:Doris Blake, Brenda Crowe, Edna Gross, Clarice Hanson, Mary Heaton, Mary Kelly, Lilian Ridgewell, Marion Wharton
